Question
========

Which statement about the $\chi^{2}$-distribution is TRUE? 
Answerlist
----------
* The $\chi^{2}$-distribution always has 1 *df*, and the mean is 1 *df*.
* The $\chi^{2}$-distribution always has 1 *df*, and the mean is 2* *df*.
* The $\chi^{2}$-distribution depends on the number of *df*, and the mean is 1 *df*.
* He $\chi^{2}$-distribution depends on the number of *df*, and the average is 2* *df*.


Solution
========

Answerlist
----------
* Incorrect
* Incorrect
* Correct
* Incorrect
